description: The objective of this contract is to support the co-development of a culturally appropriate First Nations Accessibility Assessor Training Program. The goal of the program is to establish a network of approximately 25-40 assessors who are trained to work with individual First Nations communities in identifying and prioritizing their accessibility needs.  The intended outcome of this program is to advance accessibility in First Nations communities on reserve by supporting them in assessing all aspects of operations with a view to identifying barriers to accessibility and then prioritizing them for action.

full_summary:
### First Nations Accessibility Assessor (AA) Training Program

**Reference**: 
 cb-111-63415394
**Amended Service RFP**: 8
**Government Solicitation**: 100024869

**Publication Date**: February 14, 2024
**Closing Date**: March 22, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Services Description**:
The purpose of this contract is to support the co-development of a First Nations Accessibility Assessor Training Program. The program aims to create a culturally sensitive network of assessors who can work with individual First Nations communities to identify and prioritize accessibility needs.

**Objective**:
The program seeks to establish a network of approximately 25-40 trained assessors who will collaborate with First Nations communities to assess and address accessibility barriers. The program aims to improve accessibility in First Nations communities on reserve by supporting them in evaluating various aspects of their operations, identifying barriers to accessibility, and prioritizing necessary actions.

**Procurement Information**:
* **Request Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type**: Service RFP
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement process will be governed by the following trade agreements, as applicable:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Reporting Requirements**: No reporting requirements specified in the solicitation
* **Contact Information**: For any questions or clarifications, please contact:
Cynthia Carty
Email: cynthia.carty@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 552-8150

**Documentation**:
[Click here to download the solicitation document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32022/100024869-npp-en.pdf)
